original: Sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sauttaram dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anuttaram dhamma

original: paṭicca nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasauttaro
analyzed: paṭicca na sa uttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na sa uttaraḥ

original: ca naanuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na anuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sauttarañca anuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sauttaram ca anuttarañca dhammam paṭicca na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
